SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.timing

Class TimingStateMachine

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.timing.TimingStateMachine
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnCurrentPlayerChangedListener, OnStateChangedListener
public class TimingStateMachine extends Object implements OnCurrentPlayerChangedListener, OnStateChangedListener
The TimingStateMachine class manages the timing-related functionality of the game, such as turn durations. It implements the OnCurrentPlayerChangedListener and OnStateChangedListener interfaces to receive notifications about changes in the current player and game state.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
